availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Married to Jane Gilliland in 1860. Father to Thomas Gilliland, Elmira Gilliland, Morgan Gilliland, William Gilliland, Benjamin Gilliland, James Gilliland, John Gilliland, and George Gilliland. Farmer in Jefferson County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident in Jefferson County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 437. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p.1036.
